请务必填写告警名称: Please fill in the alert name
告警名称不能超过255字符: The alert name cannot be longer than 255 characters
必须选择一条已存搜索: You must select a saved search
已存搜索已被删除，请重新选择: The saved search has been deleted. Please reselect it
时间间隔不能为空: The time interval cannot be empty
时间间隔必须为数字: The time interval must be a number
时间间隔必须大于0: The time interval must be greater than 0
执行计划间隔必须大于10秒: The interval for executing the plan must be greater than 10 seconds
时间间隔必须为整数: The time interval must be an integer
请填写正确的邮箱信息: Please fill in the correct mailbox
查看告警任务列表: View the list of alert tasks
获取总记录详情数量失败！错误信息：: Failed to get the total number of alert log details! Error Message:
时间范围不能为空，且必须为大于0的整数: The time range cannot be empty and must be an integer greater than 0
已关闭当前监控告警项！: This alert task has been closed!
已开启当前监控告警项！: This alert task has been closed!
多个邮箱地址请使用,隔开: Multiple mailbox addresses should be separated by ','
邮箱验证是必要的环节。点击验证按钮后，系统会将测试邮件发送到您填写的邮件，若收到: It is necessary to verify the mailbox. Click Verify, and we will send a test message to your mailbox to verify that the mailbox is available
关注执行已存搜索的事件总数与阈值的对比，例如您可以设置10分钟内已存搜索的事件总: The count of the events returned by executing the saved search is compared against the threshold.
关注执行已存搜索的结果中出现目标字段的计数与阈值的对比，例如您可以设置10分钟内: The count of the results with the target field returned by executing the saved search is compared against the threshold.
关注数值型字段的计算结果与阈值的对比，例如您可以设置1个月之内销售额的最小值小于: The calculation of the numeric field is compared against the threshold.
没有已保存的搜索，请先到搜索页面建立搜索信息: No saved searches. Go to the Search tab to create and save your search
时间范围必须为正整数: The time range must be a positive integer
已发送测试邮件至您指定的邮箱，请前往查看！: Test message has been sent to the designated mailbox. Go to check!
